mapper.sql: WHEN 'MAINMATERIAL' THEN '主材' WHEN 'PACKAGESTANDARD' THEN '套餐标配' WHEN 'UPGRADEITEM' THEN '升级项' WHEN 'OTHERCATEGORIESOFSMALLFEES' THEN '其他综合费' WHEN 'BASEINSTALLQUOTA' THEN '基装定额' WHEN 'BASEINSTALLCOMPREHENSIVEFEE' THEN '基装增项综合费' WHEN 'DISMANTLEBASEINSTALLQUOTA' THEN '拆除基装定额' WHEN 'DISMANTLEBASEINSTALLCOMPFEE' THEN '拆除基装增项综合费' WHEN 'DISMANTLEOTHERCOMPFEE' THEN '拆除其他综合费' END
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT CASE spm.category_code
category_code, spm.category_detail_code, pc.name as cataLogName, spm.product_name, spm.brand, spm.sku_model, spm.attribute1, spm.material_unit, spm.sku_sqec, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ssd.domain_name) as domain_name, IFNULL(sum(ssd.budget_dosage),0) as budget_dosage, ssd.loss_factor, ssd.convert_unit, IFNULL(sum(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(sum(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage from sm_project_material as spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_dosage as ssd on spm.id = ssd.project_material_id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url = spm.product_category_url LEFT JOIN prod_sku as ps on spm.sku_code = ps.`code` where contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'PACKAGESTANDARD' GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

SELECT DISTINCT CASE spm.category_code
category_code, pc.`name` as cataLogName, spm.product_name, spm.brand, spm.sku_model, spm.attribute1, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.store_upgrade_difference_price,0) as store_upgrade_difference_price, spm.sku_sqec, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ssd.domain_name) as domain_name, IFNULL(sum(ssd.budget_dosage),0) as budget_dosage, ssd.loss_factor, ssd.convert_unit, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(ssd.store_upgrade_difference_price,0)*IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as priceTotal FROM sm_project_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url = spm.product_category_url WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'UPGRADEITEM' GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

SELECT DISTINCT CASE spm.category_detail_code
category_detail_code, pc.`name` as cataLogName, spm.product_name, spm.brand, spm.sku_model, spm.attribute1, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.store_increase_price,0) as store_increase_price, spm.sku_sqec, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ssd.domain_name) as domain_name, IFNULL(sum(ssd.budget_dosage),0) as budget_dosage, ssd.loss_factor, ssd.convert_unit, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(ssd.store_increase_price,0)*IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as priceTotal FROM sm_project_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url = spm.product_category_url WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'ADDITEM' AND spm.category_detail_code = #{addItemType} GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

SELECT DISTINCT CASE spm.category_detail_code
category_detail_code, pc.`name` as cataLogName, spm.product_name, spm.brand, spm.sku_model, spm.attribute1, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.store_reduce_price,0) as store_reduce_price, spm.sku_sqec, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ssd.domain_name) as domain_name, IFNULL(sum(ssd.budget_dosage),0) as budget_dosage, ssd.loss_factor, ssd.convert_unit, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(ssd.store_reduce_price,0)*IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as priceTotal FROM sm_project_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url = spm.product_category_url WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'REDUCEITEM' AND spm.category_detail_code = #{reduceItemType} GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

SELECT ssd.domain_name, spm.product_name, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.loss_dosage,0) as loss_dosage, CASE ssd.dosage_pricing_mode WHEN 'fixedUnitPrice' THEN '固定单价' WHEN 'foundationPileTotal' THEN '基装增项总价占比' WHEN 'renovationFoundationPile' THEN '装修工程总价占比' WHEN 'dismantleFoundationPile' THEN '拆除基装定额总价占比' WHEN 'demolitionProjectTotal' THEN '拆除工程总价占比' END dosage_pricing_mode, IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as store_sale_price, IFNULL(ssd.project_proportion,IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0)) as project_proportion, IFNULL(ssd.loss_dosage,0)*IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as baseinstallquotaTotal, spm.design_remark, spm.quota_describe FROM sm_project_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'OTHERCOMPREHENSIVEFEE' AND spm.category_detail_code = 'OTHERCATEGORIESOFSMALLFEES'

SELECT ssd.domain_name, spm.product_name, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(sum(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, CASE ssd.dosage_pricing_mode WHEN 'fixedUnitPrice' THEN '固定单价' WHEN 'foundationPileTotal' THEN '基装增项总价占比' WHEN 'renovationFoundationPile' THEN '装修工程总价占比' WHEN 'dismantleFoundationPile' THEN '拆除基装定额总价占比' WHEN 'demolitionProjectTotal' THEN '拆除工程总价占比' END dosage_pricing_mode, IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as store_sale_price, IFNULL(ssd.project_proportion,IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0)) as project_proportion, IFNULL(sum(ssd.loss_dosage),0)*IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as baseinstallquotaTotal, spm.quota_describe FROM sm_project_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'OLDHOUSEDEMOLITION' AND spm.category_detail_code = #{oldHouseType} GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id
select from sm_project_material where contract_code = #{contractCode} and product_category_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{changeCategoryUrl},'%')
